articles.author: Jasper Jolly
articles.title: Chinese firms prepare to charge into Europe’s electric car market - The Guardian
articles.description: Tesla could be in for a shock as far-eastern rivals use cheap money to gain traction among affluent western car buyers
articles.content:
Tesla boss Elon Musk is not known for admiring his competition, but when Chinese manufacturer Nio made its 100,000th electric car last week, he offered his congratulations.
It was a mark of respect … [+7105 chars]

articles.title: Dye-based device sees the invisible, Business News - AsiaOne
articles.description: Tsukuba, Japan, Apr 16, 2021 - (ACN Newswire) - Scientists in Europe have designed an organic dye-based device that can see light waves in the shortwave infrared (SWIR) range. The device is easy to make using cheap materials, and is stable at high temperature…
